channel.title: It says that the Server is offline When Registering
channel.description:
I need Help getting my server to run. Every time I try to register, it says that the Server is offline, when I'm running the server.
Any Solutions?[br][size=1]Posted on: September 02, 2007, 01:38:20 PM[/size][hr]Please anyone?

item.title: It says that the Server is offline When Registering
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

Follow The guide for your router and port forward the port you want to use for your server.

Read full topic
